public int idx

token

public java.lang.String token
token string as found in document. TODO: delete this if we confirm this is always the same as ti.token. Currently yes but we keep token temporarily until ti is set.

tagStarts

public java.util.List<TagAnnot> tagStarts
tag list holding all formatting tags which start just before this token, e.g. 2 tags for hello ... Is null if no such tags exist.

tagEnds

public java.util.List<TagAnnot> tagEnds
tag list holding all formatting tags which end just after this token, e.g. 2 tags for hello ... Is null if no such tags exist.

userData

public java.lang.Object userData
general purpose data - used by LR parser to anchor trellis bottom (PTTs)
